nav.div: Thayer R-II School » News » What's New » Thayer R-II District Plan Update for COVID-19

div.h3: Thayer R-II District Plan Update for COVID-19

div.div: Thayer R-II District Plan Update for COVID-19

div.img: The Thayer R-II School District would like to update you on the plan the district is working on in respect to the Coronavirus/COVID-19 pandemic. We are in close communication with our local health department, and we continue to monitor websites of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the World Health Organization (WHO) and Missouri Department of Health and Senior Services (MODHSS) in order to keep current on this evolving situation.

span.a: Thayer R-II School District COVID-19 Information

div.div: 401 East Walnut Street, Thayer, MO 65791 | Phone 4172644600 | Fax 4172644608
